div.p: I certify to the best of my knowledge and belief, after due enquiry, that the foregoing account is true and correct in every particular, and that this expenditure has been incurred under the authority of * C.S. 1858 No. 232.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: Signature of the Officer by whom the expenditure was incurred.
